data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
See the rationale for Data::ID::Exim (which I uploaded a few
    minutes ago) for discussion of the Data::ID:: namespace choice.

    Maildir-style IDs are useful particularly to anyone who is
    operating on maildirs. They're also of great general utility, as
    they're simple, textual, and robust.
